dialogs.text: ...Stop staring at me. I'm not even doing anything wrong.

choices.text: And I'm not doing anything either.
Can you please move over by the cliff?

dialogs.text: Yes you are, you're staring at me weirdly.

choices.text: Can you please move over by the cliff?

dialogs.text: Are you trying to get me to do something bad, huh? Not that I care about that. I'm not budging cuz I'm not gonna let you push me off a cliff.
RevealResults22 I really thought that would be the reason. Looks like it's not the most influential thing to everyone.
But actually, there's something I need desperately. I lost my pencil and I have a test coming up. I might just move for you if you can find it for me.

choices.text: Do you have any more pencils?
The teacher can usually lend you one in class.
I can lend you my pencil.

dialogs.text: This is my unique lucky pencil! Don't insult its power. I can pass no test without it. Also, I've had it since elementary school. What? There's nothing wrong with that.
RevealResults23 Aw, I think they've bonded with their pencil. Just like how my best friend is a redwood tree.
I think I dropped it somewhere in that area to the right, but I couldn't find it when I searched. Go ask around if anyone saw it.
